title: Whereas the farmers of His Majesties revenue (being the persons and officers duely authorised by themselves ... &c.) have complained to us ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
notes: Title from first 7 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the fifth day of February 1676--Leaf [3].
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
